parameters.toolDescription: This API endpoint handles HTTP POST requests to the /play route. The request is used to play a song on a mobile device by sending the song's name in the request body. The server expects the request to be a JSON object with a single key, name, whose value is the title of the song to be played. If the name field is missing from the request, the server returns a 400 Bad Request error with an error message. Upon receiving a valid request, the system processes the song name and initiates playback. The response will then be a 200 OK status along with a JSON object containing details about the requested song and its playback status.
